details.title: Period doubling-chaos-inverse period doubling bifurcation in a rotor-casing dynamical system
details.abstract: A more general model of the rotor-casing system is studied numerically. In this model the casing is fixed but the effects of stiffness and damping of the rotor are considered. The numerical results show the existence of the phenomenon of period doubling to chaos and then to inverse period doubling. Chaotic motions are indicated by Liapunov exponents.
